table.name: quest_extracurricular
table.comment: Students extracurricular or sport activites (1 row per activity per student).

field.name: contact_id
field.comment: Student whose extracurricular activity is reported. FK to Contact ID

field.name: owner
field.comment: Who is the owner for this record

field.name: is_grade_9
field.comment: Did student participate in this activity in the 9th grade?

field.name: is_grade_10
field.comment: Did student participate in this activity in the 10th grade?

field.name: is_grade_11
field.comment: Did student participate in this activity in the 11th grade?

field.name: is_grade_12
field.comment: Did student participate in this activity in the 12th grade?

field.name: is_post_secondary
field.comment: Did student participate in this activity post-secondary school?

field.name: is_varsity
field.comment: Did student participate in this activity at varsity?

field.name: is_junior_varsity
field.comment: Did student participate in this activity at junior varsity?

field.name: weekly_hours
field.comment: Approximate hours per week for this activity.

field.name: annual_weeks
field.comment: Approximate weeks per year doing this activity.

field.name: position_honor
field.comment: Positions held, honors won, or letters earned
